ThingDef.label: specialty tea sachets
ThingDef.description:
An artfully crafted tea sachet, blending artisan ingredients like fragrant flowers, spices, and delicate herbs to create a soothing and refreshing brew.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 20 sachets requires 10 tea leaves and 10 fruit or flowers for a total value of 23, and sells for 2.1, giving a <color=#33CC33>45.24%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 160 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.29</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.01 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>210</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.07</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
